newsArray.title: "학생이 되기 전 이미 선생님이었던 선수" 이니에스타, 선수 은퇴[공식발표]
newsArray.description: [OSEN=강필주 기자] 바르셀로나와 스페인은 물론 축구 역사상 가장 위대한 미드필더 중 한 명인 안드레스 이니에스타(40)가 공식적으로 은퇴했다. 이니에스타는 8일(한국시간) 자신의 소셜 미디어(SNS)에 '안드레스, 당신에게 축구는 무엇을 의미하는가?'라는 감동적인 제목의 동영상을 올려 자신의 은퇴를 공식화 했다. 이니에스타는 이미 지난 2일 SNS를

newsArray.title: The unified price for tickets for the national team’s match with North Korea is 15 dirhams
creator: The News Glory
newsArray.description: The Football Association announced the launch of tickets for the national team’s match with its North Korean counterpart, scheduled for next Thursday, at Hazza Bin Zayed Stadium, within the third stage of the Asian qualifiers for the 2026 World Cup, as a unified price for the ticket value was set at 15 dirhams. “Al-Abyad” is [...]The post The unified price for tickets for the national team’s match with North Korea is 15 dirhams appeared first on The News Glory.

newsArray.title: Good news for Shabab Al-Ahly after winning the first 5 rounds
creator: The News Glory
newsArray.description: The Shabab Al-Ahly team, looking to regain the ADNOC Professional Football League title, received good news, thanks to its obtaining the “full mark”, after five rounds of the tournament, thus moving towards repeating its strong start in the 2013-2014 season, in which it had won the first. Seven rounds, a “record”, later paved the way [...]The post Good news for Shabab Al-Ahly after winning the first 5 rounds appeared first on The News Glory.
